record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - September 11, 2007)

[Page: S11433]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Armed Services be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, September 11, at 2 p.m. in open session to receive testimony on the situation in Iraq and progress made by the Government of Iraq in meeting benchmarks.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Finance be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, September 11, 2007, at 10 a.m., in room 215 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building, to hear testimony on the "U.S.-Peru Trade Promotion Agreement."

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Foreign Relations be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, September 11, 2007, at 9:30 a.m. to hold a hearing on Iraq.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Foreign Relations be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, September 11, 2007, at 2:15 p.m. to hold a business meeting.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Select Committee on Intelligence be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on September 11, 2007, at 2:30 p.m. to hold a closed business meeting.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Subcommittee on National Parks of the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources be authorized to hold a hearing during the session of the Senate on Tuesday, September 11, 2007, at 2:30 p.m. in room SD-366 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
